name: Crazy Cabby
description:
From time to time we can all feel like we are stuck in a loop.
The loop of a mundane routine.
A loop responsibilities and actions.
Perhaps you got lost in a funhouse and are stuck in a physical loop.
Or perhaps you are stuck in the loop of what feels like a dead end job.... LIKE CRAZY CABBY!!

Take control of a top down high speed taxi cab and speed around town to drop off passengers and earn cash. But don't forget to keep an eye on your vehicle maintenance and fuel, that stuff can be very costly ;)
